description:
The draco Gates has already privatized the entire public health infrastructure, transforming it into a dictatorship of corporate dominance with public health policy. In 2010 Gates marked the decade as one of vaccines, in the same year at his Ted Talk he spoke of human depopulation through various methods using new vaccines and reproductive services such as his birth control microchip. The World Health Organization adopted a global vaccine plan in 2012 that was written by none other than the Gates Foundation. Recently after the planned announcement exit of the US from WHO, The Gates Foundation is now the largest financial investor in the World Health Organization in which Gates massive investments are used as a global mechanism for agenda setting. He controls the World Health Organization. His contributions account for 80 percent of the WHO's budget with specific interests. The corona plandemic is intensifying this evil agenda with Gates poised to become even more entrenched at the top of public health with power over all mandated global vaccine ID policies as an elitist dictator.
